name: Run Glowry
description:
This ruined city wants you dead. And you must run, to survive.

Run Glowry is a 3D platformer made for a school project. You'll face 3 different levels where you will need to survive, avoiding traps and ennemies. Your goal is to end them as fast as possible to get the best score.

The game possess a score board where all the registered score are stored. Don't forget to check the "Online data" box when creating an account in order to have your name in the score board ! Try to beat our scores ;)

Controls :

ZQSD : Move
Space : Jump / Double Jump (press x2)
E : Interact
Left Shift : Dash
Left Mouseclick : Send drone to a turret
Right Mouseclick : Use the drone's shield
A : Cancel all tasks
Mouse : Camera
( No controller compatibility )
